snippet: D'Angelo Russell did extra work after practice again with the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday, competing with Jordan Clarkson in a two-on-two scrimmage....
lead_paragraph: D'Angelo Russell did extra work after practice again with the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday, competing with Jordan Clarkson in a two-on-two scrimmage.

headline.main: Russell-Young Video Flap Still Stings as Lakers Move On
headline.print_headline: Russell-Young Video Flap Still Stings as Lakers Move On
